import React from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const contactInfo = [ { type: 'Email', value: 'aviothic2.0@kit.ac.in', link: 'mailto:aviothic2.0@kit.ac.in', icon: 'ðŸ“§', description: 'Send us an email for any queries' }, { type: 'Phone', value: '+91 98765 43210', link: 'tel:+919876543210', icon: 'ðŸ“ž', description: 'Call us for immediate assistance' }, { type: 'WhatsApp', value: '+91 98765 43210', link: 'https://wa.me/919876543210', icon: 'ðŸ’¬', description: 'Message us on WhatsApp' } ]; const quickLinks = [ { name: 'Registration Form', href: 'https://forms.google.com/register' }, { name: 'Event Guidelines', href: '#about' }, { name: 'Theme Details', href: '#themes' }, { name: 'Rewards Info', href: '#rewards' } ]; return (
